channel.title: Something wrong with bat files
channel.description: Okay I've been trying to get an answer all day I've searched for 3 days straight now and I've downloaded many versions of java and put them in the right folders for some reason I cant get my clients to run they just open then close really fast. So if someone can help me for once please direct me straight to the right java file I need to download or tell me what to do because everything I've tried has been a complete failure.

item.title: Something wrong with bat files
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

many reasons it can do this
2 quick ones…
there is a small diference in the Batch files of laptops and desktops… pM me with what your using and what version of the server… ill write u a new batch file that will run the server… or client…

Read full topic

item.title: Something wrong with bat files
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Ok, right click on the .bat file, and at the very end, write

pause

then run the .bat file, and Right click > Mark > Highlight everything > press enter

then paste what it says here.

Read full topic
